works.description:
Indiagames' IPL Cricket game is the
official licensed game of the IPL. It is a simulation game on the sport of
cricket with the league details of the Indian Premier League used along
with all it's names, logos and likenesses as part of the agreement between
Indiagames and the Times Internet Limited Group (who has all the digital
rights to the IPL). Here is a news article about the game and the license
which Indiagames holds:
